dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT OD_OB_VNID ,OD_OB_VN_DATE ,OD_SC_REGION ,OD_OB_VN_CAP_ID ,OD_OB_ACTIVITY_ID ,OD_OB_ACTIVITY ,OD_OB_VPN ,OD_OB_SKU ,OD_PB_ITEM_DESC ,OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME ,OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME ,OD_SC_VENDOR_STATUS ,OD_OB_FACTORY_NAME ,OD_PB_SOURCING_AGENT ,OD_PB_REPORT_NUMBER ,OD_PB_PO_NUM ,OD_OB_VN_DS_ID ,OD_PB_DEFECT_SUM ,OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME ,OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL ,OD_OB_REASON ,OD_PB_APPROVAL_STATUS ,OD_PB_DATE_APPROVED ,OD_PB_VERIFICATION_REQUIRED ,OD_PB_DATE_VERIFIED ,OD_PB_COMMENTS ,OD_PB_ATTACHMENT ,CREATED_BY ,COLLECTION_ID ,CREATION_DATE FROM q_od_ob_vn_v WHERE OD_OB_VNID = nvl(:P_VNID,OD_OB_VNID) AND NVL(OD_SC_REGION,'X') = NVL(:P_REGION,NVL(OD_SC_REGION,'X')) AND NVL(OD_OB_VN_CAP_ID,'X') = NVL(:P_CAPID, NVL(OD_OB_VN_CAP_ID,'X')) AND NVL(OD_OB_ACTIVITY,'X') = NVL(:P_QA_ACT,NVL(OD_OB_ACTIVITY,'X')) AND NVL(OD_OB_SKU,'1') = NVL(:P_SKU,NVL(OD_OB_SKU,'1')) AND NVL(OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME,'X') = NVL(:P_DEPT,NVL(OD_PB_SC_DEPT_NAME,'X')) AND NVL(OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME,'X') = NVL(:P_VENDOR_NAME,NVL(OD_OB_VENDOR_NAME,'X')) AND NVL(OD_SC_VENDOR_STATUS,'X') = NVL(:P_VEND_STATUS,NVL(OD_SC_VENDOR_STATUS,'X')) AND NVL(OD_OB_FACTORY_NAME,'X') = NVL(:P_FAC_NAME,NVL(OD_OB_FACTORY_NAME,'X')) AND NVL(OD_PB_SOURCING_AGENT,'X') = NVL(:P_SOUR_AGENT,NVL(OD_PB_SOURCING_AGENT,'X')) AND NVL(OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME,'X') = NVL(:P_SUBMITTER,NVL(OD_PB_AUDITOR_NAME,'X')) AND NVL(OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL,'X') = NVL(:P_APPROVER,NVL(OD_PB_QA_ENGR_EMAIL,'X')) AND NVL(OD_PB_APPROVAL_STATUS,'X') = NVL(:P_APP_STATUS,NVL(OD_PB_APPROVAL_STATUS,'X')) ORDER BY 1
